Wake Screen - Black Sails
clientJobs.description:
This activity is to create a Wake Screen image to promote Black Sails on the kindle fire devices. We should be able to utilize the images created for the store picker ads as a base. We will need to deliver both landscape and portrait images sized to the appropriate specifications. The specs vary per device but some of the sizes are the same. We just want to make sure that we supply the image that will look the best on each device.

Please see the spec/guideline document in the attachment section.

The final deliverables are JPEGs, and a PNG of the button which appears to be sized the same size as the JPEG but everything is transparent execept for the button which has the call to action on it.

Here is more information beyond the attached wake guidelines:
Deliverables in PSD format:
6 Wake Screen images (horizontal and vertical for Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD and Kindle Fire HD 8.9)
3 View Special Offers (VSO) images (one each for the three devices)

Additional style guidelines:
Use minimal text , no use of trademark symbols
Please include a short and descriptive sentence or a tagline on the ad that entices download
Separate wake screen assets are needed for landscape and portrait for each of the 3 devices (6 in total). Note that each device will have slightly different asset sizes for each orientation and separate assets for each device per orientation are needed. See section (3) in the style guide.
Use of the swipe 'paddle': Please provide images with the paddle included for initial review. The paddle should include a short call to action, such as 'Download now' or 'Get the App now'.

clientJobs.title: DDS1 Sampling STARZPlay Banner
clientJobs.description:
We need to create a total of 2 DVDS1 banners to support the STARZ Play media buy. We'll also do 2 DVDS2 banners but I'll put that in another job. The only difference should be the app store badge used (apple vs android).
Please pick-up ORG5992-12-E and resize to 320x50.
Please remove the tune-in from the banners as that's no longer valid.
Specs:
320x50, gif/ani-gif, 40K max file size

clientJobs.title: Xbox One Originals Backgrounds
clientJobs.description:
This activity is to create the backgrounds for the originals series pages on Xbox One.

We'd like to have all of the backgrounds through the review process and approved by 4/4.

Our first task is to finalize a Black Sails background and a Spartacus background so the design agency can show us how the UI would work with a single season vs. multiple season original. Ideally, we'll be able to deliver these by 3/28.

We will also need backgrounds for the following:
Da Vinci's Demons
Magic City
The White Queen
Boss
Party Down
Camelot
Hollywood Residential
Head Case

Jerad has provided the UI PSD file. Please note the only "safe zone" is behind the resume image in the lower left of the UI.

Michael Chuang is working on these. Sizing should be 2048x1024px but Michael can confirm.

clientJobs.title: Xbox One Originals Backgrounds

clientJobs.title: Power Featured Images
clientJobs.description:
The programming team would like to have two images created to promote Power on the Play services.

The image can use the key art and title art. However, we're sending this through as a design request because programming wants to include the linear premiere date as well as the Play premiere date. This will need a designers eye since we've battled over premiere lock-ups in the past and we'll have many eyes on this. Ideally, we'll be creating a lock-up premiere information template that can be used for other original series premieres.

We'll have two images for each size.

Image one:
Key/TA with a lock up that communicates:
Watch it early on STARZ Play May 31
Premieres Jun 7 on STARZ

Image two:
Key/TA with a lock up that communicates:
Watch it now on STARZ Play
Premieres Jun 7 on STARZ

This is certainly not the final wording but just used to illustrate what we need.

There are many ways this can be done but the lock up may have to be modified/restructured for the image size.

Image sizes needed:
620x310
884x442
984x492
1280x350
789x308

clientJobs.title: Affiliate Social Media-STARZ Play Launch-Q3
clientJobs.description:
We will need 5 different assets to create a STARZ Play social media lauch campaign. Every assest will need to come in both Facebook and Twitter sizes:1200x900 and 1200x600.
Descriptions of assets:
1- A "Coming soon" asset
*showing the arrangement of different devices used in the STARZ OTS T3 2013 campaign OTS4243-13
*put Power UI in tablet
2- A "STARZ Play is here" asset
*include the arrangement of devices used in the STARZ OTS T3 2013 campaign. OTS4243-13
*put the Power UI in the tablet
****CANCELLED**** 3-Another "STARZ Play is here" asset
*include the STARZ Play tour video: starzplay.com under the Help tab
4-A "STARZ Play keep watching" asset
*Power themed with the image of the man in the suit holding the tablet (from the STARZ Play OTS T2 2014) campaign PLY4126-14
5-Another "STARZ Play keep watching" asset
*showing different movie titles

clientJobs.title: Additional STARZ Play Launch Images (3)
clientJobs.description:
We will need 3 more images, all in both Facebook and Twitter sizes. All images should be of the three devices, saying "Anytime, Anywhere"
Image one:
A STARZ Play + Encore Play image
include both badges
use STARZ UI in iPad
Movies you can use: Thor: The Dark World, Frozen, Zero Dark Thirty, Peggy Sue Got Married

Image two:
An ENCORE Play image
include ENCORE Play badge
Use Encore UI in iPad
movies: Zero Dark Thirty, The Aviator, Peggy Sue got Married, The Incredibles

Third image:
A MoviePlex Play image
include MoviePlex badge
use Movieplex UI in iPad
Movies: Stand by Me, Peggy Sue Got Married, Staying Alive, Bird on A Wire

clientJobs.title: ENCORE Play & MOVIEPLEX Play on Xbox One - Press Release Image
clientJobs.description:
This activity is to create ENCORE Play & MOVIEPLEX Play UIs and drop them into the approved image (individually) with a TV and the Xbox One. This device lock-up should be in the image library as a Microsoft Approved Image. The approved image has a TV to the left of the Xbox One, we will also need a TV to the right.
The TV on the left should feature the ENCORE UI and the TV to the right should feature the MOVIEPLEX UI.

The final deliverable will be one image with the 2 TVs surrounding the Xbox One. JPEGS are needed at the highest resolution possible but keeping the file size less than 1 MB.

The screen shots of the UIs are attached to the job. However we will need to change out the titles. Please contact Michael Chuang for the PSD files.

In the top right corner of the UI is the username. Please replace the name that is there with ENCORE or MOVIEPLEX respectively.

ENCORE :
Iron Man 3
This is the End
Captain Phillips
Monsters University
Men in Black
As Good As It Gets
Grown Ups 2
Magnum PI

MOVIEPLEX:
Lost in Space
Throw Momma from the Train
Awakenings
The Natural
Roxanne
High Fidelity

clientJobs.title: Play Featured Images - Black Sails (BSS1)
clientJobs.description:
The programming team would like to have an image created to promote Black Sails (BSS1) on the STARZ Play services.

The image can use the key art and title art (Black Sails season 1). Similar to Survivor's Remorse Featured Image (PLY4122-14-S)

Image sizes needed:
620x310
884x442
984x492
1280x350
789x308

The 1280x350 has safe zones of 175x350 on both the left and right side of the image. Messaging should appear in the lower right to stay away from the dynamically inserted Play button.

Rebecca Avina may have already sized the images so please contact her first.

Catch up on season one -
What is the best message for this? – “BINGE SEASON ONE NOW” or “CATCH UP ON SEASON ONE” or “CATCH UP ON THE FIRST SEASON” or something else?
